Title: In the Lost Lands
Cast: Liam Neeson; Takayo Fischer; Ron Perlman
Description: A seasoned ex-military tracker, played by Liam Neeson, leads a mission into the Lost Lands to retrieve a legendary artifact capable of saving his homeland. Battling mythical creatures and confronting his haunted past, he must rely on trust and bravery to avert disaster.

Title: Ford v. Ferrari
Cast: Matt Damon; Christian Bale; Jon Bernthal
Description: Carroll Shelby and Ken Miles team up to build a revolutionary race car for Ford, aiming to challenge Ferrari's dominance at the 1966 Le Mans. Amid corporate politics and personal sacrifice, they forge an unbreakable bond in pursuit of speed and victory.

Title: Riff Raff
Cast: Rhys Ifans; Mark Lewis Jones; Zara Turner
Description: Two estranged siblings reunite at their family's mountain lodge for a stormy weekend, uncovering dark secrets and confronting old resentments. As tensions mount, they must reconcile before their fractured past tears them apart once more.

Title: Distant
Cast: Kristofer Hivju; Zachary Quinto; Izzy Joanna Benjamin
Description: A brilliant astrophysicist investigates a cosmic anomaly that could hold the key to humanity's survival. Alongside a determined research team, she grapples with loss and wonder as she uncovers truths that challenge her understanding of the universe.

Title: Dumb Money
Cast: Paul Dano; Seth Rogen; Pete Davidson
Description: Based on true events, a group of amateur investors on a Reddit forum drive up the price of GameStop stock, rattling Wall Street elites. Through humor and chaos, they discover the power—and peril—of collective action in the digital age.

Title: Wrath of Man
Cast: Jason Statham; Holt McCallany; Josh Hartnett
Description: A mysterious armored guard named H infiltrates a cash truck company to avenge a deadly heist that killed his son. Underneath his stoic exterior lies a father seeking justice, leading to explosive confrontations and dark revelations.

Title: Bridesmaids
Cast: Kristen Wiig; Maya Rudolph; Melissa McCarthy
Description: An unfiltered comedy following Annie as her life unravels while serving as maid of honor for her best friend. Through a series of disastrous mishaps and emotional lows, she ultimately learns the value of friendship and self-worth.

Title: The Equalizer 3
Cast: Denzel Washington; Dakota Fanning; Pedro Pascal
Description: Robert McCall returns to Italy's Amalfi Coast to protect the innocent from ruthless crime syndicates. With calculated precision and unwavering morality, he delivers justice to those who cannot defend themselves.

Title: Back to the Future
Cast: Michael J. Fox; Christopher Lloyd; Lea Thompson
Description: Teenager Marty McFly accidentally travels back to 1955 in Doc Brown's time-traveling DeLorean, risking his own existence. Racing against the clock, he must reunite his parents and ensure his family's future before the time window closes.

Title: Ted
Cast: Mark Wahlberg; Mila Kunis; Seth MacFarlane
Description: John's childhood teddy bear comes to life after a wish and remains his best friend into adulthood. As Ted's wild antics threaten John's relationship, the two must navigate loyalty, growing up, and the meaning of unconditional friendship.

Title: The Sandlot
Cast: Tom Guiry; Mike Vitar; Patrick Renna
Description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town bonds with a group of young baseball enthusiasts on the local sandlot. Facing the fearsome 'Beast,' they learn that friendship, courage, and a little imagination can overcome any challenge.

Title: Palm Springs
Cast: Andy Samberg; Cristin Milioti; J.K. Simmons
Description: Two wedding guests find themselves trapped in a time loop at a desert nuptial, reliving the same day over and over. As they navigate endless possibilities, they uncover hidden fears and learn to embrace life’s imperfections.

Title: Fire Island
Cast: Joel Kim Booster; Bowen Yang; Conrad Ricamora
Description: A close-knit group of friends embarks on a summer vacation to Fire Island, where romance and drama ignite under the sun. Through laughter and heartbreak, they redefine what it means to belong and to love.

Title: Dear White People
Cast: Tessa Thompson; Tyler James Williams; Brandon P. Bell
Description: At a predominantly white Ivy League school, a group of Black students uses a satirical radio show to confront racial tensions and stereotypes. With sharp humor and poignant insights, they challenge their campus to face uncomfortable truths.

Title: Longlegs
Cast: Nat Wolff; Maika Monroe; Denise Gough
Description: An investigative journalist chases down a series of occult-themed murders, only to discover a sinister cult dubbed 'Longlegs' is behind the bloodshed. As she delves deeper, she must confront her own fears to stop the next ritual killing.

Title: Predator 2
Cast: Danny Glover; Gary Busey; Bill Paxton
Description: In 1997 Los Angeles, Lt. Mike Harrigan finds himself hunted by a technologically advanced alien predator in the middle of gang warfare. To protect his city, he must outwit the alien hunter before it claims more victims.

Title: The Abyss
Cast: Ed Harris; Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio; Michael Biehn
Description: A deep-sea drilling team searches for a missing nuclear submarine and discovers a mysterious underwater species. Navigating friendship and fear, they learn that cooperation between worlds may be the key to survival.

Title: Rye Lane
Cast: Vivian Oparah; David Jonsson; Charleigh Bailey
Description: In South London, two strangers recovering from heartbreak share a spontaneous day of adventure and connection. Amid art, music, and candid conversation, they find healing and the possibility of new beginnings.

Title: A Quiet Place Part II
Cast: Emily Blunt; Cillian Murphy; Millicent Simmonds
Description: Continuing the terrifying saga of sound-sensitive aliens, a family fights to survive in a world where any noise can be deadly. Trusting only their silence, they venture beyond the safety of their home in search of others.

Title: Fruitvale Station
Cast: Michael B. Jordan; Melonie Diaz; Octavia Spencer
Description: This emotional drama recounts the last day in the life of Oscar Grant, a young father whose routine encounter with police ends in tragedy. With powerful performances, it explores themes of hope, injustice, and the fragility of life.

Title: Palm Springs
Cast: Andy Samberg; Cristin Milioti; J.K. Simmons
Description: Two wedding guests develop a budding romance while stuck in a time loop.

Title: Run
Cast: Sarah Paulson; Kiera Allen; Sara Sohn
Description: A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret.

Title: False Positive
Cast: Ilana Glazer; Justin Theroux; Pierce Brosnan
Description: After undergoing fertility treatment, a woman begins to uncover unsettling truths about her doctor.

Title: Boss Level
Cast: Frank Grillo; Mel Gibson; Naomi Watts
Description: A retired special forces officer is trapped in a never-ending time loop on the day of his death.

Title: Vacation Friends
Cast: Lil Rel Howery; Yvonne Orji; John Cena
Description: A straight-laced couple's vacation takes a chaotic turn when they befriend an uninhibited pair.

Title: The United States vs. Billie Holiday
Cast: Andra Day; Trevante Rhodes; Garrett Hedlund
Description: Follows the singer Billie Holiday during her career as she is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics.

Title: Plan B
Cast: Kuhoo Verma; Victoria Moroles; Michael Provost
Description: After a regrettable first sexual encounter, a teen and her best friend embark on a road trip to find a morning-after pill.

Title: Books of Blood
Cast: Britt Robertson; Freda Foh Shen; Nicholas Campbell
Description: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

Title: Big Time Adolescence
Cast: Pete Davidson; Griffin Gluck; Jon Cryer
Description: A suburban teenager comes of age under the destructive guidance of his best friend, an aimless college dropout.

Title: Little Monsters
Cast: Lupita Nyong'o; Alexander England; Josh Gad
Description: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids' show personality to protect young students from a sudden zombie outbreak.
